phones.name: iPhone 15 Pro
phones.description: The iPhone 15 Pro features a titanium design, A17 Pro chip, and advanced camera system with 5x optical zoom.

phones.name: Samsung Galaxy S23
phones.description: Samsung Galaxy S23 with Dynamic AMOLED 2X display, Snapdragon 8 Gen 2, and professional-grade cameras.

phones.name: Google Pixel 8
phones.description: Google Pixel 8 with Tensor G3 chip, best-in-class computational photography, and 7 years of OS updates.

phones.name: OnePlus 11
phones.description: OnePlus 11 with Hasselblad camera system, Snapdragon 8 Gen 2, and 100W fast charging.

phones.name: Xiaomi 13 Pro
phones.description: Xiaomi 13 Pro featuring Leica cameras, Snapdragon 8 Gen 2, and 120W HyperCharge technology.

laptops.name: MacBook Pro 16"
laptops.description: MacBook Pro 16" with M2 Pro/Max chip, Liquid Retina XDR display, and up to 96GB unified memory.

laptops.name: Dell XPS 15
laptops.description: Dell XPS 15 with 13th Gen Intel Core processors, 4K OLED display, and premium CNC machined aluminum chassis.

laptops.name: HP Spectre x360
laptops.description: HP Spectre x360 2-in-1 laptop with 13th Gen Intel Core, 3K2K OLED display, and gem-cut design.

laptops.name: Lenovo ThinkPad X1
laptops.description: Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Carbon with Intel Evo platform, military-grade durability, and best-in-class keyboard.

laptops.name: Asus ROG Zephyrus
laptops.description: Asus ROG Zephyrus gaming laptop with NVIDIA RTX 40 series GPU, AMD Ryzen 9, and ultra-slim design.

shoes.name: Nike Air Max
shoes.description: Nike Air Max 270 with visible Air cushioning, breathable mesh upper, and lightweight design for all-day comfort.

shoes.name: Adidas Ultraboost
shoes.description: Adidas Ultraboost 23 with responsive Boost cushioning, Primeknit+ upper, and optimized torsion system.

shoes.name: Puma RS-X
shoes.description: Puma RS-X Bold sneakers with chunky retro design, cushioned midsole, and bold color combinations.

shoes.name: New Balance 574
shoes.description: New Balance 574 classic sneakers with ENCAP midsole technology, suede and mesh upper, and retro styling.

shoes.name: Reebok Classic
shoes.description: Reebok Classic Leather sneakers with soft leather upper, cushioned footbed, and timeless vintage design.

books.name: Atomic Habits
books.description: James Clear's Atomic Habits offers a proven framework for building good habits and breaking bad ones.

books.name: The Alchemist
books.description: Paulo Coelho's The Alchemist is a magical story about following your dreams and listening to your heart.

books.name: Deep Work
books.description: Cal Newport's Deep Work teaches rules for focused success in a distracted world.

books.name: Sapiens
books.description: Yuval Noah Harari's Sapiens explores the history of humankind from evolution to modern society.

books.name: The Psychology of Money
books.description: Morgan Housel's The Psychology of Money examines how people think about money and teaches how to make better financial decisions.
